website_summaries.verdict: A sturdy, affordable hook-on high chair from a well-known company.
pros: Safe for kids up to 37 lbs
cons: The cloth seat is tricky to remove when you want to wash it
The chair weighs 7 lbs., which is heavier than many other brands

customer_reviews.title: Be sure to put arms on correctly!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great chair to take to restaurants. Most of the time the high chairs at restaurants are sticky, and the germs from sick kids. They don't sanitize them. I love the fact that when we go to restaurants with my grandson I just sit him next to me In the booth he loves this chair. Very sturdy and great grip and I love the rubber grips that hold on to the table. Chicco was very generous and sent me a new one because I had installed the arms incorrectly and could not get them apart and it was not usable. It was not a warranty issue, it was the user of the item. Me.
customer_reviews.author: Dion DuVall - Amidon

customer_reviews.title: Pricey, but worth it
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 5 different kinds of these types of seats. I didn't let myself see the price of each one so I wouldn't just go with the cheapest one. Of course I picked the most expensive, but it goes to show the quality in design and function. Love the tray, shoulder straps, clamp style, color, roominess, holes for the legs, and portability. My 6 Mo. 17lb girl loves it and gets excited when she gets to sit with everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Christine R Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Fits securely
customer_reviews.text: I was pretty skeptical about clip on high chair because I didn’t think they would be secure. I also wasn’t sure if it would fit our table because it was a pretty big lip. But it fits perfectly and securely and my one year old enjoys sitting in it. I wish this model came in a denim blue. I almost went for a no name brand version because I liked the color better, but decided to go for the name brand for the peace of mind on safety. I’m glad I did!
customer_reviews.author: JJSR

customer_reviews.title: Great seat!
customer_reviews.text: We love this seat! A lot of the poor reviews complain about a space between the fabric and the table when the chair is installed, which was true until we snapped the sides of the fabric down like you’re supposed to do. Now the fabric almost touches the edge of the bar our seat is attached to. I was able to put my full body weight (130 pounds) on the chair with no signs of weakness and our baby loves being able to sit next to us at the bar! We bought this chair for travel, but will probably keep it up at home every day!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Barnes

customer_reviews.title: So Handy
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad I bought this! It really comes in handy when visiting family. It's so easy to use and stores so easily in the car. The only thing I wish it included is an attachable tray for the table like I've seen similar products offer. Those other products are just so pricey though so I figured I could live without one. This one was very affordable. I probably wouldn't use it every day at home; just have it in the car for when you need it while you're out. It's really secure. My 9 month old (21 lb) daughter loves bouncing around in it but that sucker is so tight on the table that there are no worries.
customer_reviews.author: K. Nemanic

customer_reviews.title: Ripped after first wash
customer_reviews.text: At first the chair was fantastic, it wasn’t really “easy” enough to take to restaurants or move to another table, but for the purpose of a stationary high chair it was fantastic. However, after washing it one time it started to rip in the corner by the legs. My son isn’t super hyper when he’s sitting in the chair so I know it’s not from use but rather it probably happened because of going through the wash. Unfortunately the chair isn’t easy to spot clean so every once in a while it does need to be washed in a machine or hand washed, but it seems that is this chair’s demise.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great chair, assemble carefully
customer_reviews.text: This chair is pretty great. I wanted something that wouldn't take up a lot of floor space and that my baby wouldn't be able to push against the table and tip over. I did have an issue putting it together. Do not try to push the "arms" back further than the two push pins. It got stuck and was unusable. I contacted chicco and after a bunch of hoop jumping they sent me a replacement at no charge.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: This has been GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: Everything came and was very easy to assemble. We bought two. One for my 2 year old and the other for my 9 month old. Everything is safe and secure and the girls have been having fun being right on the table with us. Absolutely worth the buy. Also the portability is fantastic. You can throw them in a tote and set it up at the sitters or family and its good to go. I think they could even go on some ends of park benches.
customer_reviews.author: BLP3 Motors

customer_reviews.title: So hard to clean!!!
customer_reviews.text: I just can't get it clean. The fabric doesn't come off. Also, the tightening grips have started to fail. We were so excited to get this because we're in a small apartment with limited floor space. This would have been PERFECT if only the fabric portions could be removed and machine washed (even machine wash/line dry(
customer_reviews.author: L.N.N.

customer_reviews.title: Works for most tables.
customer_reviews.text: We got this as a replacement from a gift where part of the chair was lost with luggage in travel. It's good for most tables and not too heavy, but I was a little disappointed that the style had changed so I couldn't use the old cover from the last chair we had. The new design isn't quite as tight a fit to our table, but is still safe.
customer_reviews.author: Quiningseven

customer_reviews.title: We love these
customer_reviews.text: We received one of these for free which a Chicco purchase several years ago. It was so handy and got so many compliments, that it has become our standard shower present. I believe this is the 4th one we have purchased. Ours survived both kids with no issues and is still going strong. Easy to open and close, and very compact. The only issues we encountered are tables that have large lips underneath. It may require a little more attention.
customer_reviews.author: DoggieDocNC

customer_reviews.title: Great for traveling and can be washed
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and holds tightly secure so you feel safe when having your child in it while attached to table. Also I think you can clean the fabric in the washer which gets really dirty with food messes. Child can sit close to table so its nice for traveling. Overall love this seat.
customer_reviews.author: Lani

customer_reviews.title: Must buy
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something to replace our standard Chicco high chair, to save on space at our kitchen island. I ordered this high chair, and I absolutely love it. It was easy to assemble, easy to attach, and I genuinely feel safe letting my kids sit in it. My 4 year old (25 pound child) loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Solid idea, not durable
customer_reviews.text: We like the chair and the idea. We've had it since August. Seat itself isn't holding up. It's ripping at the seams and the metal rod on the bottom, is protruding out. Dangerous for walking toddlers like mine. Wondering if they would replace just the canvas seat part?
customer_reviews.author: BrucieP

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product
customer_reviews.text: I have four children and have used many products. This is one of the worst. I have had 2 replaced by Chicco because it just stops working - the arms don’t tighten on my counter (which is the correct size). It is very difficult to take apart for cleaning which it needs after one day if you let your child feed themself. My son could also stand up in it at a very young age even while buckled. I would not recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: pcg1334

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: This is a game changer. I have told all my mommy friends and soon to be mom friends about this chair. I only have one complaint. The back of the chair is padded but the sides are not padded. So, if your kid hits their head on the side of the chair they are going to hit just the bar where the arm is for the chair.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Don't leave home without it!
customer_reviews.text: Great portable child seat for dining out, or of recent circumstances, staying in, this product is much improved from the "Sassy seat" I used for my kids 30 years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Mike J.

customer_reviews.title: Portable high Chair
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, well packaged and as described. Great idea to take to where a high chair MIGHT not be available. Also very easy to disassemble for washing durable, canvas cover. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: RPK

customer_reviews.title: Excellent gift
customer_reviews.text: This is our second one. The first one we used for 3 years with my son. We bought this one as a gift! It’s amazing to travel with. Super sturdy and it’s easily washable. We love this chair.
customer_reviews.author: Iovanay

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Love this seat. Haven’t used it as much as originally anticipated but it’s been awesome for taking to grandmas house when we stay there. So easy to pack up in the car and have a safe and comfortable place for my little guy to eat wherever we go on vacation, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Bryant Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Nice but started to RIP quickly.
customer_reviews.text: Overall the traffic is very nice. Ease-of-use and attaches to almost any table. Biggest problem is the seatbelts don't seem to be overly comfortable, in the seat started tearing rather quickly. Child does not even use every single day and started to tear in just a couple months. Still probably going to buy one more time and see if the second one last longer.
customer_reviews.author: JT Smith

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: This chair is perfect for taking to restaurants when we go out. We also have a toddler so booths are better for us but restaurant high chairs don’t work with higher booths. This is great for us to put on the inside seat in a booth so baby is next to us.
customer_reviews.author: CassandraRose

customer_reviews.title: Contains my child!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. I was hesitant; but it does hold my child in well. It cleans very nice (especially in the washing machine), which is important to me. Only cautious thing is to make sure it fits on your table/island. It has to have enough room on the bottom to be stable. Luckily, it fits for our table. It definitely helps keep my little one contained.
customer_reviews.author: Anne R. Willis

customer_reviews.title: Great for restaurant
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered two of these. One for my grandson at home and one when he comes to visit from out of state. Very sturdy. Takes some muscle to attach, but is very secure. Love the belt to keep baby from crawling out.
customer_reviews.author: MichalD

customer_reviews.title: Best travel high chair
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic high chair for travel. Easy enough to install and very sturdy and comfortable. Folds up flat to fit into suitcase
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Pratt

customer_reviews.title: Its perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is a saver, I was skeptical at first but after using it for three months it's still good and sturdy, it never fell and its a space savor... my one and half year old loved it!!
customer_reviews.author: mommy10

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: This is great to have at grandparents house for grand baby visits. Comes in very handy!
customer_reviews.author: Robin Nielsen

customer_reviews.title: I scrubbed them in the driveway and they came out fine!
customer_reviews.text: Actually I have 2. No room for a high chair and now the 14 month old twins can sit at the table. They love them!
customer_reviews.author: Laurath

customer_reviews.title: Portable high chair
customer_reviews.text: This is a great baby gift. Some people use it in place of high chair. My daughter carried hers in her car for restaurants and dinner at other people homes.
customer_reviews.author: Matthewjamessnyder

customer_reviews.title: WARNING: Disassemble with Caution / Arms Get Permanently Stuck
customer_reviews.text: At first this product was great- but then we disassembled it to travel and when we put it back together the arms pushed too far in and got stuck on the clasps. I noticed from other reviewers this has happened before. One person thought the chair was stuck at the welding. Either way it’s now useless garbage. So disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: donna pechanec

customer_reviews.title: Nice seat for the most affordable I could find.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this seat. I attached it to our bar style counter so she can be with me while I cook. She is happy and that makes me happy.
customer_reviews.author: kcase

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and safe
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for company coming from Germany! They loved it and took it with them to travel the country for 7 weeks!
customer_reviews.author: BStP

customer_reviews.title: The table it’s used in must be sturdy. We normally choose booths because they seem to be sturdier.
customer_reviews.text: My 1 year old uses this and it works great we keep it in the car for when we eat out I was paranoid at 1st but I’m fine now and it’s much cleaner than the ones at the restaurant for sure. Super easy to use it is sturdy but if the table isn’t sturdy you’ll have issues.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany McCaw

customer_reviews.title: Love it 👍
customer_reviews.text: 8 months old baby love to sit in this chair and have meal with adults :) the chair is very comfortable and sturdy. Cleaning is not bad either, just take the cloth off and Todd it in the washer.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: Well made and easy to use. Wash’s up very well
customer_reviews.author: MAGS

customer_reviews.title: High quality and well designed.
customer_reviews.text: Compact, comfortable, sets up quickly, and is very sturdy. Bought it for when our granddaughter visits.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best for travel
customer_reviews.text: Great for travel and restaurants. Can be installed in two sec
customer_reviews.author: Sana N.

customer_reviews.title: It is perfect for small spaces. No need for a giant highchair.
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this when my kids were little. It took up no space at all and is complete sturdy fabric so it is easily cleaned. I buy this for every baby shower or one years old's birthday. This is a great space saver and easily portable. Great for restaurants and grandparents.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Blacker

customer_reviews.title: Fits on any thickness of table
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grand son, and he loves it. It fits on ANY thickness of table. Great for taking to a restaurant. Thete is plenty of room for any size baby.
customer_reviews.author: paula steinberger

customer_reviews.title: Love love this product! A must buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Best little investment I made! Now and days going to restaurants the high chairs are so filthy. With this chair it’s amazing! Easy to assemble and small enough to take anywhere you go!!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: We love our Chicco!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for camping now use at kitchen table. Love that it comes apart to wash fabric in washing machine!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Musser

customer_reviews.title: Don’t trust video
customer_reviews.text: Video misleading there is no drop cloth or table tray cover. They should change the video
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia M Whitcher

customer_reviews.title: Most useful kids item we own
customer_reviews.text: This has by far been the item we have used the most for our kid. Every time we leave the house we have this in the car. Way better than a high chair, way more sanitary, and the kiddo gets to sit right up to the table. 10/10 would buy again. Every friend of ours that has a kid is going to get one of these at the baby shower.
customer_reviews.author: Fishnig28

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: I love it! So does my son. He loves eating at the table with us. Love love love.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great chair
customer_reviews.text: We really liked this chair for travelling. Super easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: majid latif

customer_reviews.title: Careful
customer_reviews.text: Be careful not to push legs in too far. I had to send the first one back as the nub went into the weld and would come out or retracing it
customer_reviews.author: maxskiing

customer_reviews.title: Personal Meal Time
customer_reviews.text: This is the greatest thing you will ever buy for your toddler. It is safe and sturdy but more importantly it allows your child to participate more personally in mealtime! They are not separated by a high chair.
customer_reviews.author: val

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent and very solid when installed. Daughter loved swinging her legs when in it and it was nice to have her be able to sit at the table with us. Does get messy fast if your baby loves to touch things with their dirty hands like mine does.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Payne

customer_reviews.title: Table must be well-anchored
customer_reviews.text: Had to return. Was unaware it could not be used on the table we had.
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: Too clumsy
customer_reviews.text: This product was hard to put together. The opening and buttons did not line up . It is also very heavy and clumsy.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn finkelstein  Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend! My daughter loves it. It’s sturdy and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Mans

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: We love using this chair. Its easy & helpful in our lives.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Chacon

customer_reviews.title: Novel design
customer_reviews.text: I liked the portability and sturdiness of the product. I felt safe placing my child into the chair. I would have liked the product more if it was machine washable for easy cleaning vs. having to hand wash and hang dry.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Simple Easy to Use Chair for Your Little One
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this chair! Allows our little one to join the others at the table or bar. Easy to assemble/disassemble and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Best portable chair ever
customer_reviews.text: This chair is amazing! We have people ask where we got it everytime we use it. It keeps us from having to use the gross highchairs in restaurants.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Cass

customer_reviews.title: Great for dining out
customer_reviews.text: When high chair not available this chair is a good option. We used it when traveling. Because the fabric is machine washable it is easy to keep clean.
customer_reviews.author: karen mead

customer_reviews.title: Great for an outdoor seat
customer_reviews.text: This chair is awesome for our one year old. We use it all the time hooked up to our picnic table when we eat dinner outside.
customer_reviews.author: Claire Zehrer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Washes off easily. Very sturdy! The belt in it doesn’t really fit well though so they easily can get out.
customer_reviews.author: Tr

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: The fabric ripped after a few months. And no foot rest can cause legs to get tingly after a while seated.
customer_reviews.author: Angela, Chris, and Farrah

customer_reviews.title: Space saver and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to have a place at the table for my grandson with out adding furniture to my kitchen. Works great! Easy to store when he isn’t here. Easy to wash too
customer_reviews.author: Christina C.

customer_reviews.title: A great travel chair for bub!
customer_reviews.text: An excellent product! Sturdy, but lightweight, with a nice high back. Easy to assemble. Easy to attach to a table.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: One of the best purchases I've made yet
customer_reviews.text: This is great for at home or going out to dinner. You can use it practically anywhere. I've recommended to many friends of mine
customer_reviews.author: Zachery

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: It so easy to use and very convenient. You do need to be careful about the table you attached it to, it can cause the table to lean.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for our needs and easy to disassemble and wash
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Baker

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Comes apart for easy cleaning. Seems pretty sturdy and puts my son right up at the table just like the big people. He loves it
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: This chair is an extremely dangerous piece of trash. Arms will not attach to table top, are not secure and create an unstable seat for a baby.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Mejias

customer_reviews.title: great so don’t have to use anyone else’s!
customer_reviews.text: Great for travel/ restaurants- need one for each car. Would like to see an insert for the littles, but it does help them gain core strength!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great for on the go.
customer_reviews.text: Works great at restaurants! Better than highchair when out and about.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, easy to use, super easy to clean. Would absolutely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Cate E

customer_reviews.title: Great if it lasted longer.
customer_reviews.text: This chair was perfect for 2 months or so... great for going out to restaurants and wasy to use, however it stopped fastening to the table within 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: TheSheepKeeper

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and collapsible
customer_reviews.text: This is a much better alternative to the bulky high chair and even works great inside most booths.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Heidorn

customer_reviews.title: No more high chair!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, safe, comfortable. You have to have a table that can accommodate it, but I believe most do.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Lopate

customer_reviews.title: Easy to attach to table
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a well-made product and easy to attach to the table.
customer_reviews.author: Lois

customer_reviews.title: Secure
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 for my small childcare center and loved it so much that I bought another. It’s perfect... fits well and securely on the table. I’ll definitely be buying more as my enrollment increases.
customer_reviews.author: itstarka

product_meta.title: Chicco Caddy Hook On Chair, New Red
product_meta.description: Color:RedThe Chicco Caddy Portable Hook-On Chair simplifies mealtime at home or on the go with secure attachment to dining tables, a lightweight frame, and a trunk-friendly fold. High-back cushioned support and a three-point harness help create a comfortable, secure seating area. An easy, twist-to-tighten design facilitates speedy, secure attachment to tables from 0.75 to 1.5 inches thick and with a skirt up to 5.5 inches thick (including the thickness of the tabletop). Rubberized arms firmly grip the table top without scratching, and the fabric seat cover can be removed and washed for easy-clean convenience. For usage with children up to 37 lbs who can sit upright without help. For use with tabletops between 0.75" and 1.5" thick; and table skirts up to 5.5" (including thickness of tabletop).
feature_bullets: Twist-to-tighten design fastens securely to most tables
Rubberized arms firmly grip table without scratching
Compact fold for travel and storage convenience
Removable seat cover for easy cleaning and care
High-back cushioned support for added comfort

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars309 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
